## ElevationProvider.getTilingScheme() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTilingScheme(): TilingScheme | undefined;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[TilingScheme](./harp-geoutils.tilingscheme.md) \| undefined

the TilingScheme used for the DisplacementMaps returned by \[\[getDisplacementMap\]\] or undefined if there is no elevation \[\[DataSource\]\] attached to the \[\[MapView\]\].
